title: Why I Hate Yasuo
body:
It's not his windwall. No, I don't care about his windwall. His windwall actually doesn't bother me in the slightest.

It's his dash. If a Yasuo gets fed you pretty much have to afk or lane swap because you can't get anywhere near a minion without risk of death. Things like this shouldn't exist.

I really had to facepalm when I saw this happen in the game between CLG and TSM today: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=okHopF2Yi-E&feature=youtu.be

replies.body: How do you think he would get near anyone without a dash? He doesn't have Yi has ms boost + targeted teleport, Trynd - spin, Fiora - dash.
I don't care that he has a dash. Having a dash is fine. It's the fact that he can dash 500000 thousand fucking times in a row that bothers me. It's the same reason why people hate Kalista.

He can have a dash.

He SHOULDN'T have an infinite dash that has 0 cool-down and 0 mana cost.

> [{quoted}](name=MLDzXnRRR,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bo3OHRdt,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-24T05:37:59.728+0000)
>
> How do you think he would get near anyone without a dash? He doesn't have Yi has ms boost + targeted teleport, Trynd - spin, Fiora - dash.

Isn't his ultimate a targerted teleport(with requirements)?

And he didn't kill him or even do that much damage to him.

It's all a show. Flashy but does nothing in the end. Let Yasuo have his fun.
They were even and Gnar had lots of armor. Of course he didn't do any damage.
I have to admit, that play yesterday made me laugh. Just seeing Zion go all the way across the lane to get an auto off onto Dyrus, just to go back and get CS was hilarious.

Your video is pretty misleading as all that happens is Dyrus takes a bit of damage, he doesn't die. I completely understand you disliking his dashing mechanic, however, you're exaggerating quite a bit when you imply that it's impossible to lane against a fed Yasuo. If by "fed" you mean that he has a completed item over you such as a statikk shiv over a needlessly large rod, then it's a bit more understandable as statikk shiv is a huge power spike for Yasuo, but even then, it's not as bad as you claim.

Yes, I understand completely that Dyrus didn't take any damage. The video is just showing how stupid his dash is. They were both fairly even and Gnar was building armor, so of course he didn't take much damage.

If instead of Gnar, that was Koggy, and Yasuo had a two or three kill lead, it probably would have been a kill.

> [{quoted}](name=Laraso,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bo3OHRdt,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2015-08-24T16:46:27.571+0000)
>
> Yes, I understand completely that Dyrus didn't take any damage. The video is just showing how stupid his dash is. They were both fairly even and Gnar was building armor, so of course he didn't take much damage.
> 
> If instead of Gnar, that was Koggy, and Yasuo had a two or three kill lead, it probably would have been a kill.

It was pretty fun to watch though. Medicore Yasuo players can't even close this large distance because of camera management. It takes too much braincells to pull this off.
just lock the camera... when you reach your target you unlock again

I have to agree, I play yasuo quite a lot and its not as bad I went like 3/0 and then a jungler came by. I went 4/11 that game. Its not hard he can only E to a enemy minion you can't go anywhere like where are you going to go? Into their nexus? Wait a minute... GENIUS.
As a yasuo main I can say that yasuo trade off is suppose to be early game,but I win almost every lane with him early...if I get few kills like I do basicly 3/0 the lane is over

His dash relies on having someone to dash through... It's great for laning phase but it kinda lacks in teamfights. Not to mention that he can be quite predictable where he's going to dash so you can catch him offguard. I think without it yasou would be complete trash since his laning phase would be pretty much non-exsistent.

Stay away from your minions unless you have a reliable stun/disengage that lets you effectively trade back.

The problem with most people is they stay right in the middle of their minion wave which is idiotic and it's the reason why you don't like laning against him

He can just dash to one of your minions, dash to you, AA-Q-AA, then dash back. You don't have to be standing inside your minion wave for him to get harass on you. I'm not going to say it's OP, but it's annoying as hell to deal with during laning phase and honestly just feels like cancer to play against.
He can really be annoying, even more when you have inmobile highly skillshot dependent champs like: {{champion:69}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:99}} and {{champion:4}} . It can be a real pain.
Dont forget it also makes him immune to skillshots.
Every 28-18 seconds
Huh? Im talking about his E.
Oh sorry, I thought you were talking about his wind wall.

Or, you know, you can just not feed the squishy melee carry who shoves the lane whenever he uses any spells.

Hell Vayne with ult could run that fast too you know.  This type of chasing power isn't unique to yasuo.

He used to be broken because his shield used to charge up way too darn quickly, and by the end game he practically never dies or take damage.

But that's gone now.

I think his dash while annoying, isn't broken. He is a carry after all, he is meant to give everyone an especially hard time when he is fed.

I just  pick {{champion:25}}  max W and farm from my tower xD  .  Buy early {{item:3361}}  and {{item:3028}}   than {{item:3157}}  , he can dash  all he wants he cant get kill mid  , cant roam cuz u  have   so  much  clear  cant tower dive you cuz of spell shield and  {{item:3157}}  and your ult   ^^
So you basically only play ARAM yet you're complaining about how Yas functions in lane? seems to me like you played against him once and had no idea on what to do and got curb stomped.

I have over 700 wins on summoners rift. I've fought Yasuo countless amounts of times, and I've won lane against him.

Lately I've found ARAM more enjoyable. That discredits my opinion?

> [{quoted}](name=Laraso,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bo3OHRdt,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-08-24T06:35:56.499+0000)
>
> I have over 700 wins on summoners rift. I've fought Yasuo countless amounts of times, and I've won lane against him.
> 
> Lately I've found ARAM more enjoyable. That discredits my opinion?



You clearly aren't experienced in laning if you have trouble laning against a yasuo.

Until you can show me where I said that I have trouble laning against Yasuo, I'm done replying to you, because I never said that not one single time. I literally just said that I've fought him many times before - I never had difficulty winning lane or going even with him (unless the Yas was good and countered whatever champion I was playing). It's extremely annoying and anti-fun, but not difficult.

You're trying to attack my character as a rebuttal and I really don't appreciate that. It really says something when you stoop to looking up someones match history to try and find something to poke at, like my ARAM games.

> [{quoted}](name=Laraso,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bo3OHRdt,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-24T05:28:15.310+0000)
>
> It's not his windwall. No, I don't care about his windwall. His windwall actually doesn't bother me in the slightest.
> 
> It's his dash._** If a Yasuo gets fed **_

Stopped reading here. Any champ is op fed

"I hate yasuos dash its so op!"

_Leaves out the fact it is almost only every used offensively_

_Leaves out how it can almost only be used in lane_

Yeah it does its job well and ONLY its job. That's what its supposed to do and it really does not much else.
bronze 1 complaints
